name: Choreography with Strangers
description:
Take part in a Mexican wave!

People start raising from the left or right of the screen!

You control the three middle people!

Press the key for each person at the right time!

Mess up three waves and it's game over!

CONTROLS (Find a set that feels comfortable):

TOPPER: E ... or ... I ... or Keypad 8

MIDDLE: D ... or ... J ... or Keypad 5

BOTTOM: C ... or ... N ... or Keypad 2

Things get harder as you play!

Made for global game jam 2017
